title: 【やさしい日本語】ウクライナのために、建物(たてもの)の 壁(かべ)に「平和(へいわ)」の 字(じ)を 出(だ)す
cleaned_sentences: [Easy Japanese] For Ukraine, the character "Heiwa" is displayed on the walls of buildings.
The words "Heiwa" were written on the building.
Russia is now attacking its neighboring country, Ukraine.
Many people have died or been injured.
There are many people who have to flee to other countries.
Japan hopes that peace will return to Ukraine.
Kitakyushu City is a city that values ​​peace.
The city council of Kitakyushu is opposed to the Russian attack.
Something special has begun in Kitakyushu City for peace in Ukraine.
The light "peace" is written on the walls of the city hall from 6:15pm to 10pm.
